name: Princess Belle
question: Her best friends are a clock, candle, and a teapot. Who is she?
altText: Princess Belle in a yellow dress holding a rose.

name: Princess Cinderella
question: Which princess has two mice friends named Jaq and Gus-Gus?
altText: Princess Cinderella in a blue gown.

name: Princess Aurora
question: Who has three fairy god-mothers and takes a long nap on her birthday?
altText: Princess Aurora in a pink dress.

name: Princess Snow White
question: This princess has seven dwarf friends that help cheer her up when she is feeling sad. Who is she?
altText: Snow White in a blue and yellow dress.

name: Princess Tiana
question: Which princess runs her own restraunt and has a trumpet playing alligator friend?
altText: Princess Tiana in a yellow dress.

name: Princess Merida
question: Which princess has big red curly hair and protects her family with a bow and arrow?
altText: Princess Merida in a green dress with curly red hair.

name: Princess Mulan
question: Mushu is always getting her into trouble, but she figures out a solution. Who is she?
altText: Princess Mulan in a green and blue Hanfu.

name: Princess Elsa
question: Which princess uses her magic to make snowy fun?
altText: Princess Elsa wearing a light blue dress made of snow and ice.

name: Princess Anna
question: Her good spirit and her friends, Olaf and Sven, get her through any adventure. Which princess is it?
altText: Princess Anna wearing a dress with a black top and green skirt.

name: Princess Rapunzel
question: All she wants is to see the floating lights for her birthday with her chameleon friend Pascal. Who is she?
altText: Princess Rapunzel wearing a purple dress.

name: Princess Jasmine
question: Which princess lives in a desert but is ready for a whole new world?
altText: Princess Jasmine wearing a blue two piece gown.

name: Princess Pocahontas
question: This princess shows her new friend John Smith to paint with all the colors of the wind. Which princess is it?
altText: Princess Pocahontas wearing a tan gown decorated with feather and beads.

name: Princess Moana
question: She loves the ocean, her people, and her pig. Who is she?
altText: Princess Moana wearing a orange tapa top and tan pandanus skirt.

name: Princess Raya
question: Who has to save the last dragon?
altText: Princess Raya wearing a sampot dress, a traditional cambodian dance outfit.

name: Princess Ariel
question: She had fins but now she has feet. She is a princess of two worlds. Who is she?
altText: Princess Ariel as a mermaid and pink seashell top.
